email.subject: Important: Submit Your Voter Form to Your Election Office
email.body_template:
Dear $!firstName,

Your voter registration and/or ballot request is NOT complete until you submit it to your election office. Remember to print, sign and send in your form to your election official who needs your signature on file. You can check your State Requirements/ Voter Materials Transmission Options to confirm the various options for transmitting your form.

We are pleased that you have received your Official Federal Write-in Ballot and can now cast your vote in this important election! Remember to sign and date your original Voter's Declaration/Affirmation - Federal Write-in Absentee Ballot form and Addendum page. Mail both items with your Official Federal Write-in Ballot to your election official who must have your signature on file to verify the ballot.

If a ballot arrives from your election officer after you mail the Write-in Ballot, please complete it and send it in to replace the Write-in Ballot.

We hope you find these new tools valuable in aiding your participation in the upcoming election!

Sincerely,
ExxonMobil Citizen Action Team
